text: sound fixes are cool but gloomy skies still a downer 😑
still gotta push through those gray days somehow 💪🌧️
hard disagree here - sometimes those little victories count just as much 🙌 balancing study & work makes even paying bills feel epic 😂 growing up is weird carousel
feel ya', student loans are real wakeup calls!
bills piling up scream "welcome adult" like nothing else imo
people think forensic labs are all cool gadgets and big eureka moments...reality? lots more meticulous protocol following and long hours squinting at samples than tv shows let on! 😂
feels even tougher when your lab hours get misjudged.

guesses: Bachelor's degree in a science field
Master's Degree in a science field

text: funny thing from working in labs - start analyzing stains on clothes scientifically rather than just washing them 🧫🤷‍♀️ kinda drives my partner nuts when i ramble about it

sure seems like there's a magic switch at 30 for "proper" adult stuff happening huh 😂 over here you're almost expected to have things figured out by then... doesn't help when everyone around starts throwing hints your way 🙄 kinda weird since we basically wing it most times anyway right?
def seeing more ladies in forensics lately 👀
yea its cool! guys also bringing fresh eyes into crime scene analysis now 👌

gotta say myths got nothing on practicality - it’s finding someone who gets your weird quirks & still sticks around 😉 imo “the one” is juiced-up hollywood talk. real deal takes patience & lots of pizza nights!
